biography: T.J. Hart is a Porn Actress from United States. She was born in Dekalb, Illinois on February 25, 1967 as Amy L. Damkroger. T.J. was raised in a Christian Methodist home and grew up in Colorado. She has an older brother and a younger sister. Hart graduated from the University of Colorado, where she was a triple major in art, psychology, and sociology with a minor in early childhood education. T.J. worked as a bartender and a Sunday school teacher prior to her involvement in the adult entertainment industry. Hart first began performing in explicit hardcore movies at age 30 in 1997; she started out in bisexual porn before eventually making the transition to straight X-rated fare. She retired in 2007.  Hart is married and has a degree in finance.
name: T.J. Hart
